segments.text: Isn ’ t this great ? I always wanted to own a farm , live out in the country , grow my own food !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This is very beautiful . Though I have to confess , I don ’ t know the first thing about farming !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s fine ! Don ’ t worry about it !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Relax , it was just a goat !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s just the cows that are grazing over there . We can milk them later .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Honey , seriously , It ’ s just a sheep . Relax ! Relax , that was just the horses and donkeys that are in the stable .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know what ? I don ’ t think I can hack it here out in the countryside . I ’ m going back to the city !
segments.speaker: S2
